text:
Liga
Levante - Barca: when the CM room the Blaugrana!
At the end of the defeat of Bar√ßa against Levante (3-1), the club has published on its social networks a tease tweet to his opponent of the 12th day of Liga.
02 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Charlie Creteur



For the third time of the Liga season, the Blaugrana lost. The teammates of Lionel Messi cracked in the second half against a valiant team from Levante. However, the Pulga opened the scoring in the first half (38th, 0-1) before the equalizer of Campana (1-1, 61st), the goals of Mayoral (63rd, 2-1) and Radoja (68th, 3th). -1). At the end of the meeting, the other Valencia club has carried on social networks his opponent of the day.




"What to do in 7 minutes?"




Bar√ßa + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

On social networks, the club has published what appears to be a montage of a search on the Google search engine. "You should search Google, what should you do in 7 minutes?" A reference to the time it took Levante players to score their 3 goals!
